articles.description: Now that Wargroove is an established name and Nintendo returned to the battlefield with Advance Wars 1+2 Reboot Camp, I had high expectations for Wargroove 2.
articles.content: The original Wargroove was a breath of fresh air for turn-based strategy fans. Nintendos colorful, cheery Advance Wars series took a darker, post-apocalyptic turn with 2008s Days of Ruin and subseque… [+9685 chars]

articles.title: OnePlus Pad Go is an Android tablet for under $300 - 9to5Google
articles.description: While it's likely only coming to India, the OnePlus Pad Go is a pretty good-looking Android tablet for under $300.
articles.content:
After launching its first tablet earlier this year, OnePlus has now officially unveiled the OnePlus Pad Go, a budget-focused version that, sadly, probably won’t be available outside of India.
